eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl

Class HttpRemoteDataStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl.HttpRemoteDataStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdvanceDataStore, AdvanceDataStoreUpdate

    public class HttpRemoteDataStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdvanceDataStore
    A datastore which connects to a remote datastore via HTTP(s) and exchanges messages via XML.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.09.27.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected AdvanceXMLCommunicator comm
      The communicator used to send and receive requests.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpRemoteDataStore(AdvanceXMLCommunicator comm)
      Initialize the datastore with the supplied communicator.
      HttpRemoteDataStore(java.net.URL remote, AdvanceHttpAuthentication auth)
      Initialize the datastore with the given remote address and authentication record.
      HttpRemoteDataStore(java.net.URL remote, java.lang.String username, char[] password)
      Convenience method to initialize the datastore with the given remote address and BASIC authentication mode.
